metadata.Title: CVE-2023-26767 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Buffer Overflow vulnerability found in Liblouis v.3.24.0 allows a remote attacker to cause a denial of service via the lou_logFile function at logginc.c endpoint.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-26767` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblouis-bin - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.4+esm1
liblouis-data - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.4+esm1
liblouis9 - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.4+esm1
python-louis - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.4+esm1
python3-louis - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.4+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: liblouis package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.6.4-2ubuntu0.4+esm1').
